pageContext.claim: “They [Democrats and Republicans] have said they are for complete border security, and they have finally and fully acknowledged that having barriers, fencing, or walls -- or whatever you want to call it -- will be an important part of the solution.”
pageContext.analysis: Many Democrats have long supported fences and barriers for some parts of the U.S.-Mexico border. What they have never supported is the large concrete wall Trump promised. The president has been moving the goalposts and now says a steel structure or see-through fencing on some but not all parts of the border will get the job done.
